text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump wasted 3 months of inadequate COVID-19 testing that could have prevented the spread of infection. He’s responsible for all the failures that resulted in 724,287 cases and 38, 186 deaths. TRUMP FAILED!
